Function.name: CanSubmitTimeSheet
Function.Value: EmployeeNumber = userEmployeeNumber() or SuperiorEmployee = userEmployeeNumber() or SecretaryEmployee = userEmployeeNumber() or booleanEnvVar('user.info.CanChangeAllTimeSheets')

Function.name: CanApproveTimeSheet
Function.Value: SuperiorEmployee = userEmployeeNumber() or SecretaryEmployee = userEmployeeNumber() and booleanSysPar('@SecretaryCanApproveTimeSheets') or booleanEnvVar('user.info.CanChangeAllTimeSheets') and booleanEnvVar('user.info.CanTransferTimeSheets')

Option.title: Time Sheets Awaiting Approval, My Employees
Option.name: EmployeesUnapprovedTimeSheets
Option.restriction: Submitted and not Approved and (SuperiorEmployee = userEmployeeNumber() or SecretaryEmployee = userEmployeeNumber())

Option.title: Not Submitted Time Sheets, My Employees
Option.name: DueTimeSheets
Option.restriction: not Submitted and PeriodEnd lt currentDate() and (SuperiorEmployee = userEmployeeNumber() or SecretaryEmployee = userEmployeeNumber())

Description.title: Balance, Total
Description.arguments: InternalTimeWeekTotal + ExternalTimeWeekTotal - (FixedNumberDay1 + FixedNumberDay2 + FixedNumberDay3 + FixedNumberDay4 + FixedNumberDay5 + FixedNumberDay6 + FixedNumberDay7)

Override.condition: not Submitted and PeriodEnd lt currentDate() and not CanSubmitTimeSheet()

ElseOverride.condition: not Submitted and PeriodEnd lt currentDate()
not Submitted and PeriodEnd ge currentDate() and CanSubmitTimeSheet()
Submitted and not Approved and not CanApproveTimeSheet()
